mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY r.reserv_time) AS rno,r.pet_name,r.owner_name,r.reserv_time FROM (SELECT * FROM reservationview WHERE DATE_FORMAT(reservation_date, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() AND reservation_yn = 'N') r ORDER BY rno
SELECT COUNT(*) as reservCount FROM reservationview WHERE DATE_FORMAT(reservation_date, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() AND reservation_yn = 'N';
SELECT COUNT(*) as recepCount FROM reception WHERE DATE_FORMAT(receive_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() AND receive_state = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) as diagCount FROM reception WHERE DATE_FORMAT(receive_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() AND receive_state = 2

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY case when receive_state = 2 then 1 when receive_state = 1 then 2 when receive_state = 3 then 3 END ) AS ino,i.pet_name,i.owner_name,i.receive_state FROM (SELECT * FROM indexreceivepay WHERE DATE_FORMAT(receive_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() AND receive_state != 3) i ORDER BY ino

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY case when pay_yn = 'N' then 1 when pay_yn = 'Y' then 2 END ASC, pay_date DESC, chart_date ASC) AS ino,i.pet_name,i.owner_name,i.pay_yn FROM (SELECT * FROM indexreceivepay WHERE DATE_FORMAT(receive_time, "%Y-%m-%d") = CURDATE() AND receive_state = 3) i

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over(ORDER BY n.notice_no) AS nno, n.* FROM ( SELECT * from noticeview
) n ORDER BY nno DESC
